title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Brain-Computer Interface-Based Motor Imagery Training Expert Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic neuroscience knowledge and understanding of motor imagery training concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the effects of Kinesthetic Mental Imagery (KMI) training on brainwave (EEG) patterns.
Learners can predict the long-term effects of Kinesthetic Mental Imagery training using Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) systems.
Learners can design personalized Kinesthetic Mental Imagery training strategies considering individual differences.
Learners can evaluate the applicability of BCI-based Kinesthetic Mental Imagery training in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
